Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, interior slightly grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior specifying the contents as oasis wine.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389871) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389871)
